title: Leadership Practice Enhancement: Systematic Literature Review for Strengthening Mathematical Instructional Design Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze over 30 papers related to mathematics instructional design to derive core principles
Learners can develop a mathematics instructional design framework reflecting procedural, conditional, and conceptual knowledge domains
Learners can apply literature review findings to actual mathematics lesson design projects to produce expert-level deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
